code_value: Questions 1~2  You are in a department store and you want to buy a new TV set. You ask the shop assistant two questions about it.</br>Questions 3~4  Your class will have a picnic. Ask your classmate two questions about it.
Questions 1~2  You are in a department store and you want to buy a new TV set. You ask the shop assistant two questions about it.
Questions 3~4  Your class will have a picnic. Ask your classmate two questions about it.
